
```{r zone_flow_table, include=TRUE}

interface.flows = tryCatch( zone_interface_flows(db), error=function(cond) {return('ERROR: zone_interface_flows query not returning correct results.')})

annual.flows = interface.flows %>% 
  filter(Type=='Annual_Zone') %>%
  select(name, value)
annual.flows$From = gsub('_.*', '', annual.flows$name)
annual.flows$To = gsub('.*_', '', annual.flows$name)
annual.flows = select(annual.flows, From, To, value)
colnames(annual.flows)[3] = 'GWh'
knitr::kable(annual.flows, digits=3)

```
